projectGridLines.title: Title: Product Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Product Intern


Description: As part of our product team, you will work on researching a wide

variety of e-commerce tools, surveying their feature sets, and participating in the

roadmap of Tectonic admin tooling and storefronts.

Skill sets:

1. Understanding of Technology with a spike in Data Analytics

2. Familiar with analytics tools.

3. Strong critical thinking and communication skills.

Traits expectation:

1. Initiative: Demonstrate strong work ethic and drive to achieve personal

and team goals

2. Resourcefulness: Seeking out resources and learning opportunities

independently, researching the problem and using online resources.

3. Willingness to learn: Strong desire to learn new technologies, grasp new

technologies and be open to feedback.

Expected learning:

1. Product strategy and road mapping

2. Witness the growth and journey of an early-stage tech startup.

3. User experience and design

4. Collaboration and teamwork

Specific courses required for project execution:

1. Probability and statistics
